title: [MINDSET] Ep. 10: “Tapping in to your truth” w/Kute Blackson
description:
Do you ever find yourself avoiding the truth? We’re conditioned to tell ourselves lies, according to this week’s guest. In this episode of the “You Turn” podcast, author and visionary Kute Blackson talks about how we can overcome our conditioning in order to tap in to our truth. Tune in to learn how to stop playing the “game of confusion.” Ashley and Kute discuss all of the ways to start feeling and accepting the truth, from becoming aware of your own patterns and accepting responsibility to slowing down and creating some space in life. Kute also discusses following your impulses, chasing your dreams, and “feeling your death.” Life will reveal itself to you… What do you have to lose? As always, don’t forget to stick around for Ashley’s post-episode thoughts!

 

You Are The One, Kute Blackson

 

Find his blog posts and more on his websites: http://kuteblackson.com and http://www.boundlessblissbali.com/

 

You can find Kute on Twitter at @kuteblackson

 

Explore Kute’s vlogs and inspirational videos on his Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCtD6zAv6aPq7OQtB5kLAghg
